body_html:
I solved the problem by changing STREQUAL to STRLESS_EQUAL at /opt/libtorch/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:59

Now I can pass the configuration stage, but not the generation stage. New errors becomes:

CMake Error:
Error evaluating generator expression:

$<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

Target "caffe2" not found.

CMake Error:
Error evaluating generator expression:

$<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2_gpu,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

Target "caffe2_gpu" not found.

CMake Error:
Error evaluating generator expression:

$<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

Target "caffe2" not found.

CMake Error:
Error evaluating generator expression:

$<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2_gpu,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>

Target "caffe2_gpu" not found.

-- Generating done
-- Build files have been written to: /home/panpan/workspace/catkin_ws/build
Makefile:4460: recipe for target 'cmake_check_build_system' failed
make: *** [cmake_check_build_system] Error 1
Invoking "make cmake_check_build_system" failed

I am using catkin_make instead of cmake:
`catkin_make CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -j12 -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5
Only one package in my catkin workspace is using libtorch.

body:
I solved the problem by changing STREQUAL to STRLESS_EQUAL at /opt/libtorch/share/cmake/Caffe2/public/cuda.cmake:59

Now I can pass the configuration stage, but not the generation stage. New errors becomes:

> CMake Error:
>   Error evaluating generator expression:
> 
>     $<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>
> 
>   Target "caffe2" not found.
> 
> 
> CMake Error:
>   Error evaluating generator expression:
> 
>     $<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2_gpu,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>
> 
>   Target "caffe2_gpu" not found.
> 
> 
> CMake Error:
>   Error evaluating generator expression:
> 
>     $<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>
> 
>   Target "caffe2" not found.
> 
> 
> CMake Error:
>   Error evaluating generator expression:
> 
>     $<TARGET_PROPERTY:caffe2_gpu,INTERFACE_SYSTEM_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES>
> 
>   Target "caffe2_gpu" not found.
> 
> 
> -- Generating done
> -- Build files have been written to: /home/panpan/workspace/catkin_ws/build
> Makefile:4460: recipe for target 'cmake_check_build_system' failed
> make: *** [cmake_check_build_system] Error 1
> Invoking "make cmake_check_build_system" failed

I am using catkin_make instead of cmake:
`catkin_make CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -j12 -DCUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5
Only one package in my catkin workspace is using libtorch.
